          <title>

          <description>
            <string language="no">Hva skjer når man fyrer i peisen? Hvilke stoffer dannes ved forskjellig stadier i fyringsprosessen?</string>
            <string language="en">What happens when you light the fireplace? Which gases are formed at the different stages in the haeting prosess?</string>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was geschieht, wenn Sie den Kamin beleuchten? 
Welche Gase werden an den unterschiedlichen Stadien in den 
haeting prosess gebildet?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que se produit quand vous allumez la cheminée ? 
Quels gaz sont formés aux différentes étapes dans les prosess
haeting ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que acontece quando você ilumina o fireplace? 
Que gáses são dados forma nos estágios diferentes nos prosess
haeting?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa accade quando illuminate il camino? 
Quali gas sono formati nelle fasi differenti nei prosess 
haeting?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό που συμβαίνει όταν ανάβετε την εστία; Ποια
αέρια διαμορφώνονται στα διαφορετικά στάδια prosess;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué sucede cuando usted enciende la chimenea? 
¿Qué gases se forman en las diversas etapas en los prosess 
haeting?</string>
          </description>
